item.title: Tuesday's big stock stories: Whatâ€™s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The Dow Industrials touched an all-time high and closed at a record Monday after the U.S. captured Venezuela's president over the weekend.

item.title: Venezuela chaos could lead to billions in investment opportunities, one consultant says
item.description: One firm says there could be $500 billion in opportunities in Venezuela over the next 10 years.

item.title: What Wall Street expects to see from CES 2026, the biggest tech show of the year
item.description: Robotics is expected to be at the forefront of the show this year. Analysts see agentic automation and semi stocks as potential winners.

item.title: Vanguard likes a 40/60 portfolio for 2026. Where the firm sees higher risk-adjusted returns
item.description: Vanguard sees better risk-adjusted returns over the next decade by leaning away from artificial intelligence stocks and being overweight fixed income.

item.title: Katie Stockton reviews some of Fairlead's best trades of 2025, including Tesla and Estee Lauder
item.description: The turn of the year is a good time to reflect on your methodology, so we reviewed what worked best for us in this forum in 2025.
